DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study evaluate impact overall experience interprofessional chronic low back pain patient care approach people rural remote area use Telehealth technology compare secure laptop base videoconferencing ( Vidyo ) .
DOC.brief_title: Interprofessional Management Chronic Back Pain Rural Remote Setting : Use Telehealth v . Secure Laptop-based Videoconferencing
DOC.detailed_description: People chronic low back pain recruit participate team assessment local rural nurse practitioner an-urban base physiotherapist link telehealth . The assessment include detailed history , physical examination jointly-delivered education recommendation community-based management . Pre post measure self-reported pain , back-specific function , quality life , satisfaction complete 2-4 week assessment . Comparison short-term outcome make group participants another study use different telehealth technology ( secure laptop base videoconferencing ) inclusion criterion , measure health care provider ( Clin Trials.gov NCT02225535 ) . The health care provider interview get feedback preference experience use different type telehealth technology .
DOC.criteria: chronic low back pain localize costal margin gluteal fold and/or relate leg pain , bad enough limit usual activity daily routine present least 3 month People : third party payer insurance ( i.e.worker 's compensation board ) back related complaint , primarily neck thoracic pain , and/ language , read comprehension barrier would limit ability adequately complete require study paperwork exclude participate study .
